title: Report a Housing Code Violation
description: A tenant wants to report a potential housing code violation (e.g., no heating) against their landlord.

tasks.description: Gather information from the tenant, including their address, landlord's contact info, and the specific nature of the complaint.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent documents the details of the alleged violation.

tasks.description: Log the complaint in the code enforcement system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new case file for the complaint.

tasks.description: Inform the tenant of their rights and the next steps, which will involve an inspector contacting the landlord.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear information and sets expectations for the tenant.
